metadata.title: CVE-2023-42883 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin Safari 17.2, macOS Sonoma 14.2, iOS 17.2 and iPadOS 17.2, watchOS 10.2,tvOS 17.2, iOS 16.7.3 and iPadOS 16.7.3. Processing an image may lead to adenial-of-service.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
